channel.title: Posts on Adam Castonguay
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Adam Castonguay

item.title: Mapping flights with Leaflet and Shiny
item.description: Related to the last post, I was curious to see where one can fly from Brisbane. After a bit of research, I saw that data on airports, airlines and routes are available online. I also saw online some attempts Here is a map that uses shiny and leaflet in R to map all destinations from most airports in the world. The code, which is partly based on a previous map made with ggplot, can be found below.

item.title: Mapping country of origin with Leaflet and Shiny
item.description: In a few weeks, I will be moving to Brisbane for work. One thing of Melbourne that I enjoyed was its multicultural feel and the diversity of restaurants that come with it. I was therefore curious to find out whether Brisbane is as multicultural as Melbourne and decided to map the country of origin of residents in Brisbane by country of origin. This is obviously not new; there are some nice maps doing the same, e.
